title: Butterfly Watch Face App
summary: Download now and enjoy Butterfly Watch Face App !

descriptionHTML:
Looking for a new beautiful theme to personalize your smart watch? Excellent! Butterfly Watch Face App is targeting everyone who enjoys beautiful watch faces.
We have just released a new amazing Watch Face with butterfly design and vivid color. Download now Butterfly Watch Face App and enjoy a beautiful experience.
How to setup Butterfly Watch Face App:
★ Install Android Wear first!
★ Open Android Wear and synchronize your device.
★ Click “More” from the watchfaces list and choose Butterfly Watch Face App.
★ That’s it! New watch face will display in a few seconds.
★ Try different themes and colors and choose the best one!
We are releasing every day different watchfaces for any mood or style. With us, you have plenty of themes you can choose from. Simple, complex, elegant, minimal, classic, modern, exquisite, colorful, vintage, golden and plenty new ones are waiting to be discovered!
Features:
★ Designed by professional artists !
★ Battery friendly !
★ Easy installing process
★ Compatible with all Android Wear devices
★ Analog display
★ New beautiful themes every day !!!
You can check anytime our best list of beautiful wear themes by clicking the “More watch faces” button in the Butterfly Watch Face App app settings menu.
Butterfly Watch Face App is compatible with:
★ ASUS ZENWATCH
★ LG G WATCH R
★ MOTO 360
★ SONY SMARTWATCH 3
★ LG G WATCH
★ SAMSUNG GEAR LIVE
★ HUAWEI WATCH NEW!
★ LG WATCH URBANE NEW!


Our watch faces are thoroughly tested on various devices so we can provide top quality, bug free products! Also, if you have any suggestions on how we can improve your experience or if you would like to see a particular watch face with some specific design please write us at the e-mail address: watchfacebytme@gmail.com. Your feedback is very important for us.
comments: Doesn't work with Moto 360 as advertised I downloaded this app because I thought it would be a great addition to my other watch faces that I change daily with my outfits. Even though it states it compatible with a Moto 360 it is not the app shifts the picture to the bottom of the screen. This makes it so you can't see the whole screen/face very disappointed!
recentChanges: Updated to support Moto 360 ambidextrous feature.
